name: Girl VS Sharks: Meg Attack!
description:
Swim fast to save your life from wild sharks in this amazing simulator game full of exciting adventures!

Have fun! Become a survivor escaping from the fastest and most dangerous creatures of the world among the ocean predators!

There is no way out! There are no lifeguards or heroes to save you!

◉ FEATURES ◉

◉ Many girls to choose.
◉ Dangerous sharks.
◉ Leaderboards.
◉ Amazing music and graphics.

Simple controls:

◉ Touch left or right to move & dodge.

Download it now! Challenge your friends and have fun! Give us a positive review!
